meanings.definition: The quality of being direct and honest in communication or behavior.
meanings.sent1: Her straightforwardnesses in telling the truth impressed everyone at the meeting.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the straightforwardnesses of his answers during the interview.
meanings.sent3: His straightforwardnesses in admitting his mistake made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The straightforwardnesses of her actions spoke louder than words.
meanings.sent5: The straightforwardnesses of the instructions made the task much easier to complete.

meanings.definition: The state of being easy to understand or follow.
meanings.sent1: The straightforwardnesses of the map helped us find our way quickly.
meanings.sent2: I prefer the straightforwardnesses of this recipe over complicated ones.
meanings.sent3: The straightforwardnesses of the math problem surprised the students.
meanings.sent4: The straightforwardnesses of his explanation cleared up all confusion.
meanings.sent5: The straightforwardnesses of the road signs made driving stress-free.
